title: A fruitfull sermon, on 1 Cor. 15. 18, 19. VVritten by VVilliam Pemble of Magdalen Hall in Oxford
author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.
publisher: Printed by R. Y[oung] for Iohn Bartlet, at the signe of the gilt-Cup in Cheapeside,
